title: New patch won't download.
body:
When I start the client the patch downloads but stops at a certain percentage. 

Does anyone one have this problem? Did you fix it? If so, how did you do it?

Much thanks!

replies.body: I have this problem every time they release a patch, I just give up and restart the patcher until it works. Thankfully for me, every time I restart the patcher I have to go through a file scan process consisting of about seven thousand files that works at a snails pace, totaling 30 or 40 minutes before I can even *attempt* to download the actual patch again. Needless to say I love it when riot updates their game. It's not frustrating at all!

Nevermind. It froze again and stop. So I uninstalled the whole thing and installed it and then realized its riots servers it just wont download. So I guess ill wait it out till tomorrow. Screw you riot!

Hey there, thanks for bringing your issue to the Help and Support boards!

It's normal for your patcher to drop to 0 Kbps download speed sometimes, because there are some parts of the patching process that don't require active downloads. I'd say let it sit for about 15-20 minutes before closing it and giving up on it. If you're still having issues getting your patch to complete, check out some of the [troubleshooting steps found in the knowledge base](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

> Hey there, thanks for bringing your issue to the Help and Support boards!
> 
> It's normal for your patcher to drop to 0 Kbps download speed sometimes, because there are some parts of the patching process that don't require active downloads. I'd say let it sit for about 15-20 minutes before closing it and giving up on it. If you're still having issues getting your patch to complete, check out some of the [troubleshooting steps found in the knowledge base](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/28732434-Patching-Issues)!

Hey! Thanks for the reply! Also its been sitting there for more then 20min stuck on 19%. Also the link is dead! Would appreciate an appropriate link! Please and thank you.

Ah, sorry! Riot updated the knowledge base recently and some of my links are still out of date it seems. I've been going through and updating them all night, so thanks for catching one I missed!

[Here's the appropriate link](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues).

> Ah, sorry! Riot updated the knowledge base recently and some of my links are still out of date it seems. I've been going through and updating them all night, so thanks for catching one I missed!
> 
> [Here's the appropriate link](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues).

Thanks alot! The patch is finally downloading properly! Thanks again!
http://gyazo.com/f235fee47bc8829d109ecf6217ca2abc uhhh that link for trouble shooting doesnt exist

Yep, my mistake. Riot updated the knowledge base recently and a few links were broken in the process. Here's the updated link:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues
